website_summaries.verdict: This more affordable Breville is a good entry-level juicer.
pros: Centrigugal juicer with speeds of 6,500 rpm and 13,000 rpm
This juicer features a large pulp storage container and a retractable cord
This is a great juicer for its price
cons: Customers noted that it does lose power after several months

website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality, durable juicer produced by one of the finest manufacturers in the industry.
pros: A well-designed, stylish, and efficient machine
It's no wonder that it's one of the most popular juicers on the market right now
cons: Doesn't have as many speeds as some competitors, but most owners looking for a good deal didn't find this to be an issue

website_summaries.verdict: While the Breville JE98XL Juice Fountain sports a lovely, durable design with dishwasher-safe parts (and is adept at juicing fruit) its steep price and poor leafy greens performance are big detractors.
pros: The Breville JE98XL Juice Fountain Plus flaunts a handsome, sturdy design and pulls lots of liquid from citrus and other hard fruit
The machine also has two speeds to handle different types of produce and a food chute to process ingredients with minimal prep
The Breville JE98XL Juice Fountain uses many dishwasher-safe parts for easier clean up
cons: The Breville JE98XL Juice Fountain Plus costs more than competing centrifugal juicers and can't draw moisture out of leafy greens as well as other machines

customer_reviews.title: The first was great, got it in 2015...but...
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these. The first is great, got it in 2015 still works perfectly. This new one I bought in 2018 has a faulty piece....when I put in the veggies the juice squirts outward at me. Now I just transport my first juicer to different locations, but I was hoping to have a second one so I wouldn't have to. I received a faulty item and the seller doesn't offer any help. Seller doesn't offer help if you get a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, buy an omega
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for my parents as mom had some health issues. At first seemed to work great, but within three weeks there is more juice in the "pulp" than the juice container!!! I've been having to strain the pulp which requires more time. Very dissapointed in this juicer, I would recommend other juicers such as omega which will save your time and money. Also Amazon not letting return is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU WANT A JUICER THAT THROWS JUICE & PULP ALL OVER THE WALLS, THIS IS THE ONE FOR YOU!
customer_reviews.text: To say that this juicer leaks, would be the understatement of the century. I've had two other juicers over the years. Never had problems like I did with this thing. I know how to use juicers, but this thing was truly mind blowing. It throws pulp and juice all over you, the kitchen and the walls on the low speed. God help you if you ever used the high speed. Also, the pulp is sopping wet. It just slings food everywhere, except where its supposed to go. It is truly a sight to behold. Wonderful gift to give to someone you can't stand.
customer_reviews.author: Just A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Update 7/2/18 Loved it until it broke
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to clean, takes about 5-10 minutes to clean if you clean it immediately after use and yes you do have to use soap and the brush every time clean on the screen blade. Remember you are eating raw fruits and veggies so clean your produce well and your juicer. Great buy! *** Update tension bar broke 7/2/18 with lite use for 5 months. Define light use: Operated juicer about 2-4 times a week cleaning juicer within minutes of use, storing unit in same place on kitchen counter during this time so unit was not moved around a lot.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have medical issues that require I get the most nutrition out of my food. Juicing was my answer. Not only does the appliance do an excellent job extracting the juice, it is easy and quick to use. Cleaning the parts was simple, too. There is no mess, since the parts are covered - nothing sprays or drips. The user guide showed me which foods used low and high power. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Poodle Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: There are quite a few parts to clean, and if you assemble it wrong you could grind plastic, but it wasn't to hard to figure out, and once dissembled, the parts are very easy to clean, and are very well manufactured. The pulp is great for the garden too! The only design flaw that I noticed, that if you hang the bar over a counter edge and drop it the wrong direction, you could damage the on/off switch which it WILL strike, so be careful. But this is a great product, and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D

customer_reviews.title: Can you say #Hellyeah!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and very easy to clean I used a bag to catch the pulp which I used for muffins
customer_reviews.author: D. kelly

customer_reviews.title: I looooooove my juicer!
customer_reviews.text: I looooooove my juicer! It has changed my life! I hate to eat vegetables and fruits but I have no problems drinking them. This juicer is SO EASY to use that now I have my daily portion of fruits and veggies with no problems! I have to say that cleaning it it's not my favorite part BUT all the pieces are dishwasher safe. The downside: It does not juice the 'greens' very well, but still works. Also, pineapples, oranges and limes need to be peeled off before juiced. Alfalfa, wheat sprouts, or "grassy" greens won't be juiced at all! Every thing else I tried so far worked beautifully: apples, carrots, beats, cucumbers, zucchini, pears, ginger, blueberry, strawberries, mago, celery, etc...
customer_reviews.author: Halini Brune

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: While this cost more than I wanted to pay for a juicer, I wanted to get a good durable one. It is attractive but has a rather large footprint on my counter. I may just keep the center motor unit on the counter and store the pitcher and pulp container. I did notice that the pump was wetter than my last cheap Waring juicer. But this juices very fast and I love the large feeding tube. Overall it seems to be a good product but wish it extracted more juice so that the pump was drier. I do love the lid on the pitcher that strains the foam from going in yoyr Glass!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jde19630

customer_reviews.title: This Juicer Changed My Life!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a Jack LaLange juicer as well as a high end masticating juicer but neither compare to this one. I absolutely LOVE my new Breville JE98XL. I get lots of juice out of my fruits and veggies, it's fast and clean-up is a snap. This juicer is great for entry level people giving juicing a try as well as seasoned juicers. It does have a fairly larger footprint on my counter, but I just don't care because I use it every day. If you are new to juicing, don't try it by using a cheap juicer because it will affect the amount of juice, the taste and the ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Drea C.

customer_reviews.title: Great CELERY juicer
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a couple of different juicers throughout the years. I feel that this one is the easiest to clean. It is simple to assemble and operate. The motor seems strong and capable of efficiently juicing fruits and veggies. The pulp that gets into the juice is very minimal. I strain my celery juice through a nut bag. This machine produced the least amount of pulp spill over. Easy to disassemble for cleaning. I appreciate the cleaning brush that is included it really makes cleaning the screen basket a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: NJH

customer_reviews.title: Decent juicer but has some issues
customer_reviews.text: At first I really loved this product and I still like it quite a bit but there have been some issues over time. First and foremost, cleaning it and maintenance can be a serious pain. It's tedious with so many parts to clean that it creates a bit of a barrier to wanting to juice anything. Secondly, over maybe 6 months or so, the filter had stopped catching all of the pulp and required a cheesecloth or strainer to filter juice prior to consuming.
customer_reviews.author: MG2506

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy
customer_reviews.text: I had a 10-year-old juicer that works better than this! I juice every 3 days and have been using it for a year and a month and I am ready to through it out! It leaks! I don't understand why you would make a juicer that leaks? I find more juice is on the counter than in the juice catcher. Very disappointed, heard good things about this brand.. maybe it's just the models? Pro tip** look for a juicer with a better seal.. (watch the video for context) my old juicer has a double seal and does not leak at all! Also, if you get this juicer make sure to get a strainer because it makes things super pulpy.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this juicer
customer_reviews.text: I had this juicer for about three years, then moved and did not pack it. It held up pretty good! Now I find myself wanting to juice again for health reasons. After reading tons of reviews and filter the bad ones from people who can never be pleased, going with this one again. Trust my dessimination. Lots of juice, pulp pretty dry, takes a carrot or celery stick like a champ. Make your own recipes, try some online. This little juicer will treat you just fine.
customer_reviews.author: mermsminator

customer_reviews.title: Its garbage. Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage do not buy!!!! Leaks juice everywhere, the juice is left with lots of pulp (excessive) . Clogs up extremley fast, and lacks the power.! Abssolutely would not buy again and would not reccomend to anybody!! 1 star is too much to rate. Im sure you could buy the cheapest one theyre is and would be better. Now im going to try to get money back. We will see how that goes with the manufacturer. Good luck and please buy a diffrent one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I've had this juicer for over a year now and it's okay but i think I'm gonna to upgrade to a slow juicer.The pros of this juicer is its fast and you don't have to chop your fruits and vegetables up the cons to me is that it leaks when you're juicing also i hate that the plastic gets so cloudy I've tried vinegar to clean it to bring it back to some sort of shine but nothing works i want something that's a stainless steel so darn tired of cheap plastic oon everything
customer_reviews.author: hoppy

customer_reviews.title: The best juicer
customer_reviews.text: I've had this juicer for three years now and it's still great! I did a ton of research before purchasing one and I'm glad I did because this one has ended up being perfect for me. Super easy to use and clean, everything comes apart and goes into the dish washer. HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alex K.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Works well for harder produce like carrots, which is what I juice the most of. Not as good with the softer produce but works decently for the price. I especially like the enclosed/lidded collection container that comes with it. It doesn't seem like a big deal but it helps tremendously with juice not splattering when it comes out and making a mess. Cleaning the machine afterwards is a pain but thats how all juicers are I guess. About half way through juicing a 5 lbs bag of carrots (or anything else) I have to stop and clear out the debris that clogs the entrance to the waste container. It builds up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: arty9

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've reserved posting a review until I had it for a few months (July purchase) - By far, this is the best juicer. It pulps everything with little to no leftovers, cleanup is so amazingly easy. I juice at least once a day (carrots, full lemons and limes, celery, fruits and other vegetables) and it handles like a champ. I'm buying one for the gf for Christmas. Bravo to a well made product!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Barry

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up no pulp good juice
customer_reviews.text: I just got my juicer today and use it immediately. Its awesome easy to clean and the juices taste real good.
customer_reviews.author: E wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Breville Juice Fountain Plus 800W
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. It's easy to clean. I use it to juice vegetables, herbs (spinach), fruits etc...but this product is not working well with watermelon. It leaves a lot of juice in the pulp container.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance, it leaks and pulp still juicy!
customer_reviews.text: I find leaks under removable processor in less than 2 months of purchase. The celery pulp are still juicy and some solid celery talks are eliminated not juiced out. This is not worth the cost. I’ll try to contact customer service, hoping for resolution and accountability.
customer_reviews.author: cheri

customer_reviews.title: Good but....
customer_reviews.text: 3rd juicer...1st 2 were Hamilton Beach low cost juicers that evidentially just kept too much juice in the pulp. This juicer I purchased only because the step down $99 Breville was out of stock forever, everywhere! So, I purchased this one. It is much better than the Hamilton Beach however: 1. The pulp shoot stops up and doesn’t fill the pulp container. Just sticks within the grinder 2. I run the pulp again twice and can get out another 1/3-1/2 cup of juice from pulp Suggest the $99 Breville
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy La Puma

customer_reviews.title: Buy this Juicer!!
customer_reviews.text: Best juicer ever!! Easy instructions! Easy to assemble! I love it!! Don’t buy liners for where the extra parts go, I just use grocery bags or the bags you put your fruit in when you grocery shop. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine McMillan

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a mini RTD2 ninja
customer_reviews.text: Thing thing is awesome, it has blended everything we have thrown at it. Cleaning is a bit of a pain but still worth it. Just make sure you are pre-cutting everything and changing speeds depending on what type of foods. Apples, Carrots, Celery goes on hyper-speed. Oranges, strawberries, grapes are on the slower speed.
customer_reviews.author: Calidjone

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this!
customer_reviews.text: It’s fast to use, but leaves a lot of fibers and does not properly filter it. For the amount of money you pay for it, you would expect it to filter the fiber properly so you can get some actual juice. Nope!
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel S

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The machine is bigger than expected. However, I'm really like it. This is my first juicer, and I think it's great to introduce people into the juicing world. The pulp is fairly dry and I haven't found any large chunks. I would recommend to line the pulp collector bin with a plastic bag ( easy cleanup ). Cleaning up the machine is not horrible, the included brush tool to clean the filter is helpful. The plastic seems like it would stain if the juicer was left uncleaned. WASH THE JUICER AFTER USE.
customer_reviews.author: Leelee

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews and waited so long to buy a juicer. A family member recommended this one to me and I went ahead and got it. It is higher priced than I wanted to spend, but it’s been worth it. I have had absolutely no issues with this juicer. I juice half or a whole bunch of celery every morning. The included brush helps keep the filter clean. Highly recommend! And if you haven’t heard of Medical Medium, check out the benefits of celery juice! :)
customer_reviews.author: Haylee Holt

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! I am so happy I got it... I have been making my green juice in a regular mixer and oh my... I have been missing out! This changes the texture of the juice completely and even gives it a better flavor. I put a few strawberries and a banana for my son to drink and he loved it! It is easy to clean but it does take a little time as you have to clean all the parts. It says it’s dishwasher safe but I have not tried that yet. I am so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NoeliaP

customer_reviews.title: it easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The juicer works as described, it easy to clean, and juices really fast. The downside to this juicer is, because it juices so fast, it oxidizes the juice and it creates a lot of foam and separation. A slow juicer is far more superior as it makes a fresher more tastier juice that can be kept for days instead of a few hours. I also find that this juicer leaves some pulp in the juice, which I don't care for. Overall i'm not disappointed in the juicer, but I wouldn't recommend it. You can find a masticating (slow) juicer for around the same price, that will yield better results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Important info when juicing lots of greens!
customer_reviews.text: We received this for Christmas. We use 3 times per week for 2 months and now it fails to strain and the juice is very pulpy. I am looking to return it! Updating my review: I talked with Breville customer service and they were a great help! When you can no longer see through the mesh strainer it needs to be cleaned with vinegar or lemon/baking soda. In our case we will probably need to clean/soak once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: 15 months old, it's spewing juice everywhere!!
customer_reviews.text: At first it was ok, no issues, it's about 15 months now and slowly it started leaking juice around the edges, now it's toast and leaks all over the place. For $150, that is totally unacceptable. I'll never buy another Breville.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce O Matic

customer_reviews.title: Expensive disaster
customer_reviews.text: Wet chunky pulp. non stick like veggies get stuck on filter where food pusher can't reach so they just head into the pulp shoot. I don't know why every thinks this is great for leafy greens when I always get a pathetic dribble from huge kale. Upside it takes carrots, celery, and cucumber well but that is it. I should have done more research first, thats my bad. But if you want good yield in general and the ability to not have apple, pineapple, and other fruit not getting stuck and discarded- don't buy this juicer. And running pulp through again to get what was missed only results in a mess and 95% of the time is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sibylle

customer_reviews.title: *UPDATE Review*
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: My juicer sucks! It sprays juice out of the top - all over my clothes - staining them, all over my counter and floor. It worked great the 1st, I have used it approx 8 times or less because of all the work it takes. It leaves the pulp wet so I have to refeed it through the tube as to not be wasteful - and the pulp is still wet. ------------------------------------------------------------------------ LOVE: I use this juicer once a week and I love it! The pulp is mostly dry and if it's not dry enough, I run the pulp through one more time! It makes quick, easy, and delicious juices!
customer_reviews.author: valsellstexas

customer_reviews.title: 3 years no longer strong
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this juicer in 2015 I LOVED IT! Now, three years later, and it is no longer working efficiently and today I had to buy another juicer. When I first got it and juiced the pulp was relatively dry. Now, the pulp is very wet and I am not getting the juice yield I once did and I don't know where the problem lies. It still works but now I have to juice twice as much fruit and vegetables to fill the mini pitcher which is a bummer. However, I do believe Breville is a great brand.
customer_reviews.author: lashell

customer_reviews.title: Leaks everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I used to have one several years ago and remember being happy with it. This is the same exact model. It’s terrible! Leaks everywhere though I can’t quite figure out where it’s coming out. The juice is also very thick and gets chunks in it. I’m really disappointed, I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Doodle Bird Terrariums

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for Our Needs
customer_reviews.text: Thought about trying a different Breville Model or even a different brand, but stuck with this as our second time with the exact same product. After replacing the Micro-mesh Disc Filter once for $20 in the original, we opted to purchase a whole new unit rather than invest more money in the old one ... even though it was still operating just fine. Definitely not disappointed. Still functions perfectly for our once-a-day juicing of mostly vegetables. "Shouldn't fix what isn't broken" pops to mind, and this product meets our needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for more Healthy living
customer_reviews.text: When you are trying to lose weight and get the whole family healthier it's great to have a juicer in the kitchen so that we can get some more vitamins and minerals with less of the faces from the kids. This is made for more watery fruits and vegetables so there is quite a bit of moisture left over in the pulp. Sometimes I run it thru twice. Also not ideal for leafy vegetables like Kale or chard.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN YIP

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Powerful. The product design is very good; however, pulp still gets caught in the cover just like the Jack LaLanne model. But, this motor is powerful, and the pulp is drier than the Jack LaLanne version. The pitcher fits snugly into the side of the juicer, and is very convenient. It does juice kale, the secret being to run apples through the system after the kale. It is not too loud. I leave it out on the counter because it looks classy enough to do so. I had to laugh at the reviewer who said tomato juice came out pink. Well, of course it does!
customer_reviews.author: PlumBlossom

customer_reviews.title: Use it everyday
customer_reviews.text: I use the juicer everyday. Sometimes twice a day to make celery juice. It works really well and I don't have any complaints. It juices pretty fast and smooth. With the exception of one small area that I use a q-tip for it's pretty easy to clean. It comes with a brush that works great for the blade area. It's super safe, it literally won't start unless the glass is locked in over the blade and It would be extremely difficult to touch the blade while one even if you tried to. For the price it's a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: cbax

customer_reviews.title: You can't return this item!
customer_reviews.text: The juicer is just... meh. It works better with harder fruit/veggies. But add some leafy greens and it gets confused in separating the juice and pulp. What isn't listed in the descriptions is you can't return this item. Even if you want to pay for the return shipping. You simply CANNOT return it. Amazon simply gives you the manufacturer's number so you can spend weeks trying to resolve an issue that is just not fixable. So think very hard on if you want just a meh juicer at this price because you'll be stuck with it for good.
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: Juicer works well but motor will prematurely fail.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in November 2018 but didn't use until summer of 2020. After 3-4 months of use the motor malfunctioned and we were no longer able to use. However, Breville only has a 1 year warranty on their products so it isn't eligible for a replacement. Our credit card has extended warranty coverage but we need to provide a report from an authorized service center, which we were able to locate one nearby nor were we offered support by Breville when we contacted them to help assist with our service claim. This has been a very disappointing experience for a well-known brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: This juicer leaks whenever I use it. Yet Amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: This juicer leaks whenever I use it. Yet Amazon won’t let me return it even though it’s still within the 30 days return window. What a scam!
customer_reviews.author: Trung Pham

customer_reviews.title: Breville is my new breakfast pal
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase. I was torn between buying the $299.99 or $399.99 model due to the higher power. I read an article which highly recommended this model. At half the price of the other two, I don't regret this. It sucks the juice out of the carrots I bought it for with little to no moisture left in the chaff. I use it once daily in the morning. I also try to wash it immediately so to preserve the life of the sieve as others have recommended. I barely use my Ninja blender now. Cheers to homemade juicing!
customer_reviews.author: Dandelion 🌼

customer_reviews.title: Very simple to use, easy clean out, powerful but quiet motor.
customer_reviews.text: As a first time juicer, I did a lot of homework before purchase. Cheaper ones seemed unreliable and did not want to spend $250 - $300. This seemed to have best reliability and decent price for the features I needed. Did not see dimensions listed, but for those who need info: it is (assembled) 17" wide x 17" tall x 8" deep. If pressed for space, take off juice pitcher/catcher and width is 12". I love this and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Suddenly stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the juicer and was careful with the maintenance. I wouldn't use it every day and would always make sure I clean it. One day, the juicer just stopped working. Out of the blue. It's not a cheap investment, and it's frustrating that it stopped working for no reason. And the Breville support website doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: ines

customer_reviews.title: Super Disappointed, fast but not efficient
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed :( The pulp isn’t very dry, meaning the there is still juice within it. There consistently are some large pieces of vegetable in pulp container that aren’t juiced. I would not categorize this as “easy” clean up. There are many components that need to be cleaned. I bought this in hopes to make my family juice before work but realistically it won’t happen every day due to the amount of clean up and having to put pulp back through to try to get more juice. The machine is fast but not efficient 😔
customer_reviews.author: McGreg

customer_reviews.title: Joking aside, it's a nice little appliance
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is excellent, but I told the wife it'll never get used and just end up taking up countertop space. Here we are a month after Christmas and surprise, the shine has worn off. It hasn't been used for going on two weeks and we've had to throw out more fresh veggies that i care to admit. But hey, it's gonna last forever...
customer_reviews.author: Whitman31

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: This was a great juicer........for two days...........I tried juicing wheatgrass and it broke the juicer. It should have said 'dont try to juice wheatgrass' I am going to switch to a masticating juicer instead
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bethlen

customer_reviews.title: Wet pulp
customer_reviews.text: This product is not returnable so just make sure you really want it when you buy it. It has a lot of parts that need cleaning up and the pulp is still very wet. After first juice Im so sad it didnt work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Juice with pulp
customer_reviews.text: My previous breville (looks like this one) had worked for almost 5 years, so I wanted to buy another one. It’s easy to use & I already know how to clean it well & care for it. I replaced it with this one & after juicing a couple times I need to return it. I’m getting pulp in my juice & the juice output seems less than my other juicer gave me.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: first time juicer
customer_reviews.text: Im a first time juicer and I must say I feel GREAT after juicing. This machine is easy to use, yeah the cleanup is a little annoying but knowing im getting all my greens in makes the cleanup worth it. Ive had it for 2 months now and I use it once a week. Great stuff, if youre a picky eater like I am try the Juicer. you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Wrona

customer_reviews.title: Awful Juicer Machine.
customer_reviews.text: After juicing twice, I still have to Squeezing it with cloths to get the juices out. The machine is also getting louder after 3 weeks. Look at the picture. I already did juice the celery twice but right after second time I squeezed it with cloths to get the juices out. Sometimes I am in rush to get out of home, this is not the good machine to help you SAVE TIME. Look at those 2 pictures that I posted: In the white bowl shows how much Juice I got after squeezing. Not a good Machine. You Are Wasting your money and wasting the fruits and Vegetables. I am not recommending this machine to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ava T

customer_reviews.title: For the Money - This is a Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Unless you want to go very high end and, pricey, this is a great juicer. Clean up is easier. There is little waste. The only down side is ginger will clog it. I save the ginger for last and, know, that I will have to take a minute and, rinse off the screen before the juice is done. But, overall, this is the juicer I recommend. For the price point, it is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbra Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do greens well, but otherwise OK
customer_reviews.text: Inspired by the movie, "Fat, Sick and Nearly Dead", we purchased this and really wanted to love it. I visited forums and other reviews for techniques, but just couldn't seem to get it to make green juice efficiently...more often than not, any green leafy vegetables would go straight through the exit chute, even after rolling leaves or wrapping them around other vegetables. It makes quick work of fruit and carrots--as any juicer should--but the sopping wet pulp begged to be run through again as a 'normal' operation. We ended up returning this for a much slower juicer at a similar price point, and are much happier with it and are throwing away much less.
customer_reviews.author: Woodstomper

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to get the printing label for a long time and I chated the customer service and mentioned to me remain the stuff as it is but the amazon refund the money.So now I am outside USA and back after a month .So when I back I can return the stuff of this reminding me,but the customer service confused me and late to return ,he said it is now remain with you and gift of grace said but now you make me offended still not returning Thanks Ashenafi
customer_reviews.author: Ashenafi B.

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, then blades went dull quickly
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old juicer with this and loved it at first. The power was great. The juicing capability and quality was good. Like all blades, this one wore out. However, it wore out rather quickly. I only purchased this on 12/26/18. I cannot get a replacement because the company's site says they are out of stock (I have been on a mailing wait list for a month now). I didn't locate one on Amazon either, so I'm a little disappointed. Juice now comes out the sides of my machine because the blades are too dull to handle the vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: SeanSpycee

customer_reviews.title: I still bought it because of the overwhelming amount of positive reviews and because it was the one recommended by Joe Cross fro
customer_reviews.text: Even though I had read the reviews that the motor on this machine stops working after a few uses, I still bought it because of the overwhelming amount of positive reviews and because it was the one recommended by Joe Cross from the Documentary "Fat, Sick and Nearly Dead". Unfortunately, I only got a month worth of use out of it. The motor died as other reviewers experienced. Note: I wasn't using it every day either.
customer_reviews.author: RRR

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a juicer so I finally broke and bought this one. I absolutely love it! Its easy to use sturdy and fast!!!! Just do not put the past that pushes the fruit down in the dishwasher!!!! It will bubble up and you won't be able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bradford

customer_reviews.title: You need one!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! I got it and put it right to use! It was super easy to use and to take apart and clean! It seems sturdy and is not to bulky. I would 100% reccomend this. It got a lot of juice out of the vegetables and fruit I juiced and the pulp it spit out was dry which tells me it got the maximum amount of juice it could out! I have tried blending fruits and veggies in my ninja blender before and then straining and it was such a hassle. This juicer made juice quick simple and fun!
customer_reviews.author: kierstenlynn

customer_reviews.title: Sad it quit working/Super wet pulp
customer_reviews.text: I've had my juicer for maybe about a month now, and I will be returning this product. I juice celery everyday, and at first the pulp was extremely dry. Fast forward about a month later, and the pulp is so wet that when I take a handful of it into my hand, I can wring juice out of it. Really not happy that there was this drastic of a change in the pulp this quick. I will contacting be contacting the company for a return. Also, whole chunks of celery are also not getting juiced, and are ending up in the pulp bin, along with the leafy parts. This is not a good machine to juice anything leafy.
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: Works great on most fruits and vegetables.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this juicer for several years. It works very well on most fruits and veges. The only issue I can see is on leafy greens. I get juice but it looks like I also get lots of waste that could have been extracted to a higher extent. However, I could not see paying over $500 for a high end cold press juicer just for that reason. I have used this juicer since 2011. Still works great!
customer_reviews.author: desertr0se

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer that won’t break the bank.
customer_reviews.text: I waited for a couple weeks to review this juicer, I wanted to use it and put it through the paces, OK I seriously love this juicer! Handles my fruits and veggies very well and dang, it’s fast and powerful...now, I donot juice greens-(leafy) so I can’t tell you how that goes...I do a lot of veggies and fruit, as well as ginger and turmeric root. For the money this is a great juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Kenick

customer_reviews.title: Best JUICER for the MONEY$$ :-)
customer_reviews.text: This juicer I have had for a couple years now., it work great. Yes i did need to ask the company Breville for a new basket . But they did provide one Even after the one year warranty But this is a beginner juice machine. It is expected that you move to a better quality juicer after a couple of years if you are really into juicing, Otherwise for occasional use this juicer is fine. I don't juicer every day but I'm glad I have it when i need it
customer_reviews.author: Sista Vee

customer_reviews.title: I wish I can return this
customer_reviews.text: I have basically this brand new on my kitchen I used once when I got it and another time trying to do an smoothie but oh no it's a nightmare. I wish I can return it , but since I can't if anyone see this message , text me I can give to you for half of the price or even less. I rather that than having something I don't use because is too much.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very well made with heavy base.  Lots of power.  Juices everything THOROUGHLY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product once you get the feel for putting it together and taking it apart for cleaning. The first time or so you you use it, you feel as if Rube Goldberg was the chief designer, but pretty soon you get the hang of it and recognize how thoroughly and easily it juices everything you throw at it. It seems very well made with a heavy base and what sounds like an airplane turbine spooling up when you start it. It has plenty of power and really gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: TH3298

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this from amazon
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work properly. Created too much pulp. I had the same one that I had used of my friend'sshes it worked amazing. Amazon wouldn't let me return. They make you work through their tech support which did not help the issue. I should have bought at my closest Macy's, if the was an issue I would have been able to exchange it. Just a joke seeing it was Prime.
customer_reviews.author: lanabanna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean. Powerful enough.
customer_reviews.text: This model is exactly what I was looking for. I have the Breville compact juicer which works fine, but I wanted one that was easier to clean so I would be inclined to juice more often. This model makes juicing so much easier as far as clean up. Plus the motor is a tad more powerful than my other one. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nolamar

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!!!  But this
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering buying a juicier, this is the one. I hated making juices for my husband for years. Now I realize it wasn't making the juices that I hated, it was the juicer. The clean up is so easy and it juices everything so nicely. I make him a juice every day and I have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Value for money. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time at juicing, so I have nothing with which to compare this juicer. I found that the instructions were easy to follow. I made a few recipes that I found on the internet and then just started experimenting with produce that I like. Clean up was easy. I found that quite a lot of froth accumulated on the top, which I just spooned off. I don’t know if this is the case with other juicers.
customer_reviews.author: Jane T.

customer_reviews.title: Love this juicer
customer_reviews.text: It's super fast and doesn't mane pulp. My husband and i don't like pulp in our juice. It's a clean juice.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Azevedo

customer_reviews.title: Super fast!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second juicer, so I decided to spend a little bit more compared to the last one. This is super powerful and cuts my juicing time in half. I don’t need to cut everything up in 3 inch pieces. I juice a lot of celery and this definitely squeezes more juice out. Easy to assemble too!
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Easy Machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer. I read the other reviews of leaks and mess, but I find if I line up the pieces and they drop into place, there are no leaks. I found it easy to clean, and now I have good juice. I found if I let the juicer spin after last veggie or fruit is put in to juice that I get more juice. I am very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: JoyIsDestiny

customer_reviews.title: Tired of feeling fat, sick and nearly dead?
customer_reviews.text: The best juicer out there besides the slow masticating kind but those are unaffordable. Works like a charm everytime for over two years now. Way easier to clean than the Jack Lalaine one, and smoother and quieter. You will not be disappointed. To your health!
customer_reviews.author: Paradise*Gardens

customer_reviews.title: Made a mess
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been juicing my entire life and I’ve owned a few different machines and I’ve never had one make as big of a mess as this one did. The company has horrible customer service all they did was gave me excuses of what could’ve happened. I’ll be returning this product in going back to my old juicer. The only reason I bought this one is because it was a Black Friday sale and I was looking to upgrade. Don’t waste your money not worth the mess it made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Don't be like me and first buy a cheap juicer at Target, and then a slightly better one on Amazon, all the while reading the excellent reviews for this machine. The first two machines went by the wayside in a hurry and I finally spent the money on this one. Worth every dollar. And I juice almost every day. Often multiple time per day.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheated
customer_reviews.text: Even before the product reached me and I opened it the price was dropped and when asked the supplier(Electronic Express) they say 'We are unable to go any lower than the price listed' when they themselves have reduced the price. This is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Deepali T.

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: I had a Hamilton beach juicer from Walmart and this juicer is so much better I get so much more juice out of my fruits and vegetables I could hardly believe it the first time I used it and it has a lot of power and it’s really quite I work all shifts I can use it when everyone’s asleep but the Hamilton beach was Too loud I couldn’t use it unless everyone was awake at the house the only thing I can say my money was well spent on this juicer
customer_reviews.author: james allen bell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very good juicer. I've had this for over a year and it works like it did on the first day. Easy to clean, I use a large brush and I completely clean the filter in less than 5 minutes. Machine is powerful has no problem juicing anything. Here's a tip, I save those clear bags you get from the grocery store and use them to collect the pulp. This saves time having to clean the pulp holder without a bag in it.
customer_reviews.author: Effie Kehagias

customer_reviews.title: The bride loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I had this sent directly to a third party after finding it on her wedding registry. The fact that she had it on her registry shows what she thought of it. And she wasn't disappointed either. Now she uses it all the time and makes a lot of different kinds of juices!
customer_reviews.author: JohnJ

customer_reviews.title: Performs worse each time
customer_reviews.text: I've used it about 15 times now and each time the performance gets worse. First use I thought it was great and I didn't understand all the negative feedback. Now after a few uses, it's spewing juice droplets and food particles all over the place. This is not due to user error. I know what I'm doing and I thoroughly researched how to use it and what speed for each type of produce. It's still making a huge mess and yielding a little less juice each time. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Love the juice...hate the process
customer_reviews.text: Works well. But it is absolutely horrible to clean. There are about 8 separate large parts that need washed every time you use it and scrubbing the screen filter thoroughly takes close to 5 minutes in itself. I love the juice and am happy with the quality but the company needs to reexamine ease of use. It is not a convenient process and that causes me to not want to even get it out of the cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Heather K

customer_reviews.title: I like it but don't LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for about 2 months now. I like it but don't LOVE it. It's a good juicer for a beginner (like me). It does what it's intended to do. I do at times have to run the produce again through the machine to extract more water out. Which I hate sometimes because it gets messier thsn it already does. I had been doing smoothies for a good while prior to starting juicing and I honestly prefer smoothies just because cleanup is easier (with my nutri bullet). But overall it's a good starting point for juicing.
customer_reviews.author: jnr15

customer_reviews.title: best juicer I used so far
customer_reviews.text: worth every penny. I used the Cuisinart CJE-1000 1000-Watt juicer before and it could not hold up with this juicer. this Breville juicer just has 3 simple settings, low, high, off, and its hell of powerful on its high setting. juicing kale is like a bliss on this one. its much easier to clean and it pours lots of juice into the juice container.
customer_reviews.author: Carlofornia

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Juicer is great to go through carrots, beets, ginger, something which my last juicer had an issue with. The pitcher with splash guard helps speed up cleanup after juicing. The pulp container off the side is big enough to juice two pitchers worth of juice and not have to empty the pulp container. Most of the pulp comes out relatively dry, meaning the juicer is extracting the most juice it can. The exception is citrus fruits, like oranges and grapefruits. The pulp is wet with those two.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Michael

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.Stop paying $5 every time for all those pressed juice brands
customer_reviews.text: Breville products hardly disappointment and this one is no different . Shall i say it makes great juice minus the mess . Great product to buy when your on a cleansing regime . Stop paying $5 every time for all those pressed juice brands. Get this and save some money in long term . Also this device reminds me to act on the quote "drink your veggies and eat ur fruits " more often .
customer_reviews.author: tvr

customer_reviews.title: great quality but ...........
customer_reviews.text: It I great, HUGE, will last and probably be handed down in family/friends forever .... Just wish it were smaller and less work. It is a bit of a production to not do but it is the cleanup of all the parts they are big parts..... definitely is good product though. I am celery juicing this cleanse will revolutionize the celery industry 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Vermont artist

customer_reviews.title: This item has very little power
customer_reviews.text: It has less power that my previous one I had had for over 3 years that I bought for under $30. It look beautiful that is true and it is easy to clean but it stops if you put more than 1 veggie in at a time. Its bad. STAY AWAY from this one!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Franco

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer for the family
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! A few highlights: 1) it provides a high power which allows you speed up the whole process 2) it has a giant container on the left- you can press lots of fruits/veggies at one time 3) the juice container can filter out extra bubbles- you will only drink real juice
customer_reviews.author: Malexxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Messy, Loud, and an all around Hassle
customer_reviews.text: As much as I wanted to love this juicer, I hate using it. It’s a pain to juice anything. I’m not sure if it’s a defect, but juicing makes the BIGGEST mess. On high speed, juice shoots out multiple crevices. It gets on my white cabinet, looks like someone poured juice on the countertop, and it makes the overall experience a negative one. I love to make juice, but not with this juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Dijon Moore

customer_reviews.title: Takes time, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: You really need to set aside time for this one. You need to prep the fruit and veggies and carefully wash all the parts promptly after juicing. The juicer, however runs perfectly as long as you follow the directions (which are very clear.)
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great name but terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: i am not usually a negative person or a complaner. i bought this model to use instead of my Omega macerating type jucier. the reason i bought the Breville JE98XL Juice Fountain Plus 850-Watt was so my jucing process on a morning is quicker. This juicer leakes when juicing and make a terrible mess and the blades havegot dull very quickly. so much so, I am not using it any longer and this is not even a year. my Omega is 5 years old and still magnificent.
customer_reviews.author: Reade

customer_reviews.title: Excellent low cost option
customer_reviews.text: I have used professional juicers and this compares rather well. I rarely use the high setting. Using daily for juice cleanse. It works great, is easy to assemble and disassemble. Haven't found anything it can't handle! Doesn't weight a ton and doesn't take up a lot of room in my tiny kitchen. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and Fantastic Juice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The juice is terrific....and it's so easy to clean. It makes the juice so quickly, and there are two speeds and I've used them both for different vegetables. We are thrilled. There is a large pitcher with a top that catches the juice so you don't have to keep putting different glasses under the juicer. And, as I wrote...easy to clean and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Sprays juice all over!
customer_reviews.text: Product sprays juice all over the counter, as others have stated.
customer_reviews.author: undergr0und

customer_reviews.title: A fun way to get healthy
customer_reviews.text: This was a very easy machine to use. I have been enjoying apple juice and carrot juice, and celery juice. Its a good way to get some health into your life.
customer_reviews.author: sharon rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Amazon refusing to accept return of this useless juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Beware this is a scam! This juicer is a mess, very easy to get it wrong while placing multiple parts together to start juicing, leaks easily and create a mess. Cuts veggies and throws them in bin (without actually extracting much of juice from them). When I tried to return after a few days, And once you are done, it is extremely hard to clean up all the parts. I was told that this item is 'not returnable' due to some internal return policy of Amazon, which is visible to customer support - but not to customers @ the time of purchasing this juicer...
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: I loved it at first
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first. After less then a year things have broken off (divider in plastic part of the spout) it generally doesn't work that well (not much juice anymore) & it sprays juice at me threw the side seams. My bf has the upgraded all stainless steel breville that he has had for years it still works great! My jacklalane juicer (even though a step down) worked better & more consistently for prob 4 or 5 years +. I juice every single day.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal W.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing in a lot of ways. It’s fast, can fit a lot of veggies and fruit and it can handle small whole apples. BUT it lets a lot of the skin of the veggies and fruits through. So you literally have to peel everything. I hate pulp so this makes the blender kind of suck.
customer_reviews.author: Katyface

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean up and goes in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I use this juicer primarily to do celery juicing. It takes a small amount of time to clean the pulp off before putting in dishwasher, but cleans up well in dishwasher. Initially I hand washed and that was a real pain. I have only ever tried carrots in this juicer besides celery, and that was great, too. I only wish I had space to store on my kitchen counter, but I have a galley kitchen so I disassemble it and put in a cabinet when not using.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Tessmer Stack

product_meta.title: Breville JE98XL Juice Fountain Plus 850-Watt Juice Extractor
product_meta.description:
The Breville JE98XL's dual Speeds allow you to juice both hard and soft fruits and vegetables Get into the world of juicing with this no-nonsense dual-Speed juice fountain. Ideal for first-time juicers, this juicer runs on 850 watts and has two Speeds, 12,000RPM or 6,500RPM, for hard and soft ingredients.

HIGH QUALITY JUICING, ENTRY-LEVEL PRICE
Fruit is largely composed of water, but its selling point is its nutritional value. How do you extract the juice from fruit, without leaving the nutrients behind? Breville’s Nutri Disc and patented juicing system extract more nutrients than other juicers and transfers less than 1.8F of heat to protect enzymes and maximize nutrient absorption of select nutrients.

The dual Speed, 850 watt motor allows you to juice hard fruits and vegetables like apples and beets on high Speed at 12,000 RPM, while the low Speed (6,500rpm) is optimal for softer fruits and leafy Green vegetables like cantaloupe and spinach. The Juice Fountain Plus cutting disc is so powerful that pineapple can be juiced in large chunks with the rind on. In addition, this juicer features an extra-wide 3-inch feeder chute that accommodates large chunks or entire pieces of fruit or vegetables, eliminating the need for chopping vegetables.

The JE98XL is not only easy to use, but also easy to clean. It is pulp-ejecting and comes with a large-capacity pulp collector and most parts can be cleaned on the top shelf of the dishwasher.

The extra wide 3" feed chute makes pre-chopping most fruits and vegetables unnecessary PRODUCT FEATURES:
 * Heavy-duty 850 watt motor with dual Speed control: a low Speed (6,500rpm) for softer fruits and vegetables and a high Speed (12,000rpm) for harder fruits and vegetables
 * Patented extra-wide feed chute (3” wide): juice large fruits and vegetables with little to no cutting or preparation
 * Patented direct central feed system for maximum juice extraction
 * Nutri Disc with stainless steel blades and stainless steel mesh filter basket for spinning out the pulp
 * Heavy grade polymer body for durability
 * 1 liter juice jug (34 fl. oz.) with froth separator
 * Large capacity pulp container with integrated handle
 * Cord storage: the power cord wraps around feet and clips into position under the base for a reduced counter-top footprint
 * Safety Locking Arm prevents the juicer from operating without the cover locked into place
 * Overload protection prevents over-heating, automatically shutting the machine down when it senses that the machine is overloaded
 * All materials that come in contact with food are BPA-free, ensuring safe use
 * Easy clean-up with the included cleaning brush. All parts except for the mesh filter basket/Nutri Disc and food pusher can be washed on the top shelf of the dishwasher.

Model BJE820XL: Juice Fountain Duo 800JEXL: Juice Fountain Elite BJE510XL: Juice Fountain Multi-Speed BJS600XL: Juice Fountain Crush JE98XL: Juice Fountain Plus BJE200XL: Juice Fountain Compact Key Feature Die-cast juicer with soft fruit attachment and variable Speed capability 'Rolls Royce' of Juicers: die-cast metal matched wtih power Variable Speeds maximize yield across variety of fruits Makes thicker juices and yields more juice for leafy Greens and wheatgrass than non-masticating juicers Great entry price point for Breville juicers Compact design takes up less space, with all of the juicing capabilities of the other juicers Type of Juicer Centrifugal Centrifugal Centrifugal Masticating/slow juicer Centrifugal Centrifugal Motor 1200 watt 1000 watt 900 watt 240 watt 850 watt 700 watt Speed 5 Speeds ranging from 6,500rpm to 13,000rpm Low Speed of 6,500rpm, high Speed of 13,000rpm 5 Speeds ranging from 6,500rpm to 12,500rpm 80rpm Low Speed of 6,500rpm, high Speed of 12,000rpm 14,000rpm Materials  * Heavy grade die-cast metal body
 * Titanium cutting disc
 * Stainless steel micromesh filter
 * Stainless steel puree disc
